name: template-express-pg-prisma
description: A starter project for Express.js with PostgreSQL and Prisma on FL0

scripts.build: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:dbpush
scripts.start:dev: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:dbpush && nodemon -r dotenv/config src/index.js
scripts.prestart: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:dbpush
